name: Dive (itch) (seanarooni)
description:
Dive into a newly discovered ocean in your research submarine to view the magical sea life never before seen by human eyes.

Use the arrow keys the move out of the way as you dive past all the aquatic animals on your way to the sea floor.  

Tips: Your hit box is the viewing sphere in the middle of your submarine.

Dive was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48.
